name: Rewire (itch) (Nimja)
description:
Your keyboard is collapsing; with every keystroke you make, your buttons come one step closer to breaking. To get around this, you must make sure to rewire your functions to different controls. Stay in control of yourself, and try not to break.

Created for the GMTK Jam 2020.

Code by:
Roxerg - https://roxerg.itch.io/
Nimja - https://nimja.itch.io/

Visuals by:
Corpusclockwork - https://www.instagram.com/corpusclockwork/

Music by:
fluxe
https://soundcloud.com/fluxemusic/sets/rewire-ost

Meta-controls:

To remap keys; click on the key icon and then the control icon, or vice versa, to create a link between the that key and action. Doing this to a pair that are already linked will unlink them; this can help preserve a key, as only bound keys will be damaged by enemies.
